001package edu.cnm.deepdive.uno.service;
002
003import edu.cnm.deepdive.uno.model.domain.User;
004import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
005import io.reactivex.rxjava3.schedulers.Schedulers;
006import javax.inject.Inject;
007
008/**
009 *  Repository class for getting User information in the application. It calls the configured
010 *  GoogleSignInService which provides the relevant user data.
011 */
012public class UserRepository {
013
014  private final GoogleSignInService signInService;
015  private final UnoServiceProxy proxy;
016
017  /**
018   * Constructs and instance of the UserRepository.
019   *
020   * @param signInService GoogleSignInService used to retrieve user details
021   * @param proxy The proxy used to send webservice requests to get user details.
022   */
023  @Inject
024  public UserRepository(GoogleSignInService signInService, UnoServiceProxy proxy) {
025    this.signInService = signInService;
026    this.proxy = proxy;
027  }
028
029  /**
030   * Returns the User associated with the saved bearer token in the GoogleSignInService.
031   *
032   * @return RxJava Single, which emits the current User logged on.
033   */
034  public Single<User> getCurrentUser() {
035    return signInService.refreshToken()
036        .flatMap(proxy::getCurrentUser)
037        .subscribeOn(Schedulers.io());
038  }
039
040}
